name: Knight
description: Honorable knight fighting for their queen, a bulwark of defense and unwavering resolve.

bonus.name: Knight's Vow
bonus.description: Choose your desired vow for a permanent passive effect.

choices.name: For The Queen!
choices.description: Allies within 3 squares gain a 10% bonus to defense.

choices.name: Holy Pact
choices.description: Heal for 5 health at the start of each of your turns in combat.

name: Archer
description: A nimble combatant who excels at ranged attacks, picking off foes from a distance.

bonus.name: On the Hunt
bonus.description: Choose your desired hunting bonus for a permanent passive effect.

choices.name: Animal Bond
choices.description: Gain a companion animal that assists in combat.

choices.name: Swiftness
choices.description: Increases your movement speed by 1 and gives a chance to evade attacks.

name: Mage
description: A scholar of arcane arts, wielding potent elemental magic and controlling the battlefield.

bonus.name: Arcane Mastery
bonus.description: Choose your specialization in the magical arts.

choices.name: Elemental Affinity
choices.description: Increases damage dealt by elemental spells by 10% and gain 5% resistance to all elemental damage.

choices.name: Scholarly Focus
choices.description: Increases maximum Mana by 20 and gain 10% Mana regeneration per turn.

name: Monk
description: A master of martial arts, relying on speed, precision, and inner spiritual energy.

bonus.name: Martial Path
bonus.description: Choose the focus of your rigorous training.

choices.name: Iron Fist
choices.description: Increases unarmed attack damage by 15% and gain 5% chance to critical hit with unarmed attacks.

choices.name: Flowing River
choices.description: Increases evasion chance by 10% and gain 1 additional movement speed.
